title: MrCryptHodl
author: MrCryptHodl
created_time: June 02, 2022, 07:15:00 PMLast edit: March 19, 2024, 11:37:54 PM by MrCryptHodl
content: Bitcoin Hourglass 1oz Fine Silver CoinWelcome everyone to the Official Bitcoin Hourglass 1oz Fine Silver Coin sales !The stealth release of this Q2 2022!! At the front of the coin you can find the design of the famous Bitcoin hourglass, inside you can see lots of "B" of Bitcoin! on the bottom we find the inscription "21 MILLION" and on the top "VIRES IN NUMERIS". on the left you can see the famous quote from Satoshi Nakamoto "If you don't believe me or don't get it, I don't have time to try to convince you, sorry."Serial 1 to 0150, this time each serial number are laser graved directly on face of the coin.Each coins Public BTC address is laser graved in the back side of the coin, the BTC vanity addresses of these coins all start with "1Time ..."All the coins have the denomination 0.0021BTC and are sold loaded [Of course they will be loaded once they reach the hands of their new owners like always]And of course, as promised, each order will have a free PEPE patch, and these beautiful thank you cards that you can see below !  Once again, a big thank you to everyone for your trust and support!Purchase limit of 5 coins per person as long as this message is there. Serial Numbers cannot be choose, first arrived, first served.Bitcoin Hourglass 1oz Fine Silver CoinMintage : 150 - 92 SOLD / 58 AVAILABLEMaterial : Fine Silver .999Size : 39mmThickness : 2.6mmWeight : 1ozDenomination : 0.0021BTC Serial : 1 to 150Price :  per coins + 0.0021 BTC loading per ingot BTC Payment AdressBTC [Legacy] :1M5LwdwAFN5WJVczHTrLMpwzoiZ678b1RYBTC [Segwit] :bc1q9jl9jtgh6ld5mw63twpwnf3v222re3all6s7ngShipping cost [Express + Tracking] :Worldwide: 1-5 coins - 16$6-25 coins - 25$Europe: 1-5 coins - 13$6-25 coins - 22$All paid orders will be dispatched within 48 hours Unlike last sale, the loading of the parts will be done by sending Batch, you will not need to ask for loading, it will be automatic, the tracking will be followed.After payment please send me the following information :TxID :Amount of BTC : Chips / Loading / ShippingShipping details : use privnote if possible[If you can include email to details it's better for customs.]Reference
